title: Governor says Trump administration waging war against California
text:
Governor says Trump administration waging war against California 2:49pm EST - 01:16 
California Governor Jerry Brown on Wednesday accused President Donald Trump's administration of declaring war on the most populous U.S. state after the Justice Department sued to stop policies that protect illegal immigrants against deportation. Rough cut (no reporter narration).   
California Governor Jerry Brown on Wednesday accused President Donald Trump's administration of declaring war on the most populous U.S. state after the Justice Department sued to stop policies that protect illegal immigrants against deportation.
